name: A Family United
effect: If you have only Good characters in your party, draw 2 cards.

name: Academy Instructor - Teaching
effect:
Male, Non-Unique, Soul Reaper

Discard a Student from your hand: Search your deck for a Soul Reaper with the same name and put it in your hand. Limit once per turn.

name: Acidwire - Over Possessive
effect:
Evil, Hollow

Discard a card from your hand when you attack: If all characters in your party are Hollows, you may attack with Acidwire's QCK as any stat for this attack. Use only when you attack with Acidwire.

name: Attacked from Within
effect: Discard a character in play. Lose power equal to that player's highest stat. Your opponent loses power equal to that character's highest stat.

name: Balance of Souls
effect: Discard a character in your party: Discard a character in your opponent's party.

name: Cammie - Adorable
effect:
Animal, Cute

Discard Cammie from play: Search your deck for a character with "Karakura" in the title and put it in your hand.

name: Central 46 Inner Chamber
effect: Discard Central 46 Inner Chamber from play: Renew an opponent's attacking character and remove it from battle.

name: Chad - Waiting
effect: Your other Non-Student humans get +1 to all stats.

name: Clash of the Titans
effect: Discard all characters in play that are not in battle. Use only while you are defending with a character.

name: Constant Bickering
effect: Renew a character that costs 1 energy or less. That character can only deplete to attack this turn.

name: Don Kan'onji - World's Premiere Spiritualist
effect:
Good, Human, Male

When Don Kan'onji wins a battle against a Hollow, remove it from the game instead of discarding it. When Don Kan'onji loses a battle to a Hollow, return him to your hand instead of discarding him.

name: Enjoying the View
effect: Attach Enjoying the View to a battleground you control. Attached battleground can't leave play from your opponent's effects.

name: Enter the Hero
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Search your deck for a Good character and put it in your hand.

name: Friendly Rivalry
effect: Chose 2 characters in your party: When one of those characters wins a battle this turn, renew the other character.

name: Gathering of Hollows
effect: Search your deck for an Evil Hollow and put it in your hand.

name: Gin Ichimaru
effect: Your Squad 3, 5, and 9 characters all belong to all 3 of these Squads. <*> When one of your Squad 3 characters enters play, you may return a character in your opponent's party that has a cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.

name: Golden Cannonball
effect: (Limit 1 per deck.) Your character gets +4 FOR this battle. Play only during battle.

name: Hado 31, Shakkaho
effect: Return a character in play to its owner's hand. Use only when that character deals you power damage this turn.

name: Hammered!
effect: Deplete all Squad 3 and all Squad 10 characters in your party: Those characters cannot be discarded or removed by your opponent's effects this turn.

name: Helping Out
effect: Deplete a character in your party: Shuffle X cards from your discard pile into your deck, or search your deck for X cards and discard them. X = your character's energy cost.

name: Hihio Zabimaru
effect: (Renji Abarai) You do not have to discard a card to use your guardian. (*) When one of your Soul Reapers would be discarded from play by an opponent's effect, you may discard a Soul Reaper from your hand to keep that character in play.

name: Hogyoku
effect: Attached character gains the Evil trait. (*) Attached Soul Reaper or Hollow gets +2 to all stats.

name: Huge Hollow - Gathering
effect:
Evil, Hollow, Non-Unique

Deplete: Your opponent cannot defend against this attack. Use only when you attack with a Hollow that costs 4 energy or less.

name: Ichigo - A New Incarnation
effect:
Cute, Male

Ichigo gains the Good or Evil trait while all other characters in your party have that trait. Ichigo gains the Hollow or Soul Reaper trait while all other characters in your party have that trait.

name: Ichigo - Injured
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper

Deplete Ichigo when a Soul Reaper enters play. (*) Renew Ichigo when you play a battleground. Limit once per turn.

name: Ichigo - Renewed Vigor
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper

When Ichigo enters play, you may put up to 3 characters from your discard pile at the bottom of your deck.

name: Ichigo - Rushing In
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper
Aggressive. When Ichigo enters play, renew one of your other Soul Reapers in your party.

name: Ichigo - Standoff
effect: When one of your Zangetsu items would leave play, you may attach it to an Ichigo character of any version in your party instead.

name: Ichigo - Substitute Soul Reaper
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper

Discard a character card from your hand: Ichigo gets +2 to all stats for this battle. Use only while Ichigo is defending. Limit once per battle.

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
effect:
Guardian's Power: 37

At the start of the game, you may put in play 1 body energy.

name: Image of the Future
effect: Deplete, discard a card from your hand: Search your deck for a character card whose name matches the character Image of the Future is attached to and put it in your hand.

name: Imminent Danger
effect: Discard the top X cards of your opponent's deck. X = the number of characters in your opponent's discard pile, to a max of 10.

name: Isane - Worried
effect:
Cute, Female, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Discard Isane from play: Gain 2 power. Use only while you have 2 or more other Squad 4 characters in your party.

name: Izuru - Trapped
effect:
Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Deplete, remove Izuru from the game: Your opponent puts X energy back into his side deck. X = the number of Squad 3 characters in your party, to a max of 4.

name: Jidanbo - Hokuto Gatekeeper
effect:
Male, Soldier, Spirit

2 Mind: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any Spirits discarded with this effect into your hand. Use only while all the characters in your party are Spirits.

name: Jin - Wounded
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Human, Male
When Jin enters and leaves play, discard the top X cards of your deck. X = the number of Bounts in your party. <*> Jin gains "Aggressive" while you have less power than your opponent.

name: Jirobo - 4th Seat of Squad 7
effect:
Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When Jirobo enters play, you may return a character with an energy cost of 2 or less to its owner's hand.

name: Johnny Yong Bosch - Voice of Ichigo Kurosaki
effect: Signing at Booth 3547. Dates: Saturday, July 28 11 a.m. - 1 p.m. and 3 p.m - 5 p.m Sunday July 29th 11 a.m - 1 p.m.
(large format card: 4x6 inches with Soul Society butterfly symbol)

name: Kisuke - Joking
effect:
Good, Human, Male
Discard any number of items from your hand: Characters in your opponent's party get -X to all stats this turn. X= the number of items you discarded by this effect.

name: Kisuke - Supremely Confident
effect:
Good, Human, Male

When Kisuke enters play, draw 1 card for each item you control, to a max of 5.

name: Kisuke - Surprisingly Helpful
effect:
Good, Human, Male

Discard an item you control: Choose a character in your party to get +2 to all stats this attack. Limit once per attack.

name: Kon - Emo
effect:
Animal, Cute, Good
Deplete, return Kon to your hand from play: Gain 3 power. Use only when you discard a card from your hand for the effect of your Kon guardian.

name: Let's Do It Together
effect: Deplete a character in your party: Your character in this battle gets +4 to all stats for this battle.

name: Lirin - Diabolical
effect:
Cute, Female, Human
Deplete: Put the top card of your deck face down under Lirin. Use only when you have a Kuroda or a Noba in your party. <*> When Lirin leaves play, put all face-down cards beneath her into your hand.

name: Mahana - Inquisitive Schoolgirl
effect:
Cute, Female, Human, Student

Your events cost -1 mind energy to play, to a minimum of 1.

name: Maki - Armed and Dangerous
effect:
Cute, Evil, Male, Soul Reaper
When Maki enters play, collect any number of cards from your discard pile as Souls. You may put in play a Bount from your discard pile with an energy cost less than the number of Souls collected this way.

name: Mizuiro - Smooth Operator
effect:
Cute, Human, Male, Student

Return a Student in your party to its owner's hand: Your opponent loses power equal to that character's energy cost. Use only on your turn. Limit once per turn.

name: Mod Soul - Enhanced
effect:
Non-Unique

Remove Mod Soul from the game: Search your discard pile for a Human that has an energy cost of 4 or less and put it in play. Use only while Mod Soul is the only character in your party.

name: Nanao - Squad 8 Lieutenant
effect:
Cute, Female, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When you attack with Nanao, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If you do, you may put 3 non-character cards from your discard pile at the bottom of your deck. Use only while you have 1 or more other Squad 8 characters in your party.

name: Narrow Escape
effect: Discard 1 card from the top of your deck for each power damage you would take from this attack instead of taking its power damage. Use only when you would take power damage.

name: Nemu - Squad 12 Lieutenant
effect:
Cute, Female, Soldier, Soul Reaper

X Mind: Discard the top X cards of your opponent's deck. Use only while you have 1 or more other Squad 12 characters in your party. Limit once per turn.

name: On the Move
effect: Choose up to 4 characters in play that cost 4 energy or less. Those characters cannot attack this turn.

name: Orihime - Confused Friend
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Student, Whole

Discard a card from your hand: If that card is a Student, gain power equal to its energy cost. Use only while you have less power than your opponent. Limit once per turn.

name: Party Time
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Deplete any number of characters in your party: Gain power equal to the number of characters you depleted with this effect.

name: Passing Over
effect: Choose a depleted character in play and discard it. That character's controller gains 2 power.

name: Portal to the Soul Society
effect: Discard Portal to the Soul Society from play: Search your deck for a card from the Seireitei expansion and put it in your hand.

name: Protective Shield
effect: You take -2 power damage from each attack this turn.

name: Rangiku - Helpful
effect: Aggressive. Squad 10 characters in your party cannot be discarded from play from your opponent's effects.

name: Rangiku - Squad 10 Lieutenant
effect:
Cute, Female, Soldier, Soul Reaper

(You may play Rangiku for no energy cost if you played Toshiro this turn.) When Rangiku enters play, you may deplete a Male character in play. Use only while you control Toshiro.

name: Reality Check
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Cancel an activated card effect or event in the queue.

name: Renji - Determined
effect:
Cute, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

When Renji enters play, you may attach a Zabimaru to him from your discard pile for no energy cost.

name: Renji - Unleashed
effect: (You may discard a Renji of any version in your party and lower this character's energy cost by that character's exact energy cost. You cannot modify this character's cost except by that effect.) When Renji enters play from your hand, search your deck for 3 different Squad 6 characters and put them into play.

name: Renji Abarai
effect:
Guardian's Power: 36

When you play a Soul Reaper, you may deplete it and discard a card from your hand to search your deck for an item with that character's name in its text and attach it to that character for no energy cost.

name: Restrained
effect: Evil characters in your opponent's party get -3 to all stats this turn.

name: Right in the Eye
effect: Your character gets +4 INT this battle. Play only during battle. (*) Limit 1 copy per deck.

name: Rukia - Aghast
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human
(You may play Rukia from your hand anytime you could play an Event). When Rukia enters or leaves play, Good characters in your party gain "Defensive 3" until the end of that turn.

name: Rukia - Nearing the End
effect: When Rukia leaves play, Good characters in your party gain "Aggressive" for this turn.

name: Rukia - New Classmate
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human, Student

2 Body, deplete: Put a Student from your hand into play. Lose power equal to that character's energy cost.

name: Senkaimon
effect: Characters in your party that do not have the Spirit trait gain the Spirit trait.

name: Shuhei - Hardworking
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper
(When Shuhei is discarded from your hand for a card effect, your opponent discards a card. Use only while you have at least 1 Squad 7 character in your party.)

name: Shunsui - Polite Drinker
effect:
Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Put 3 Squad 8 characters from your discard pile at the bottom of your deck: Shunsui can attack this turn. Use only when Shunsui enters play.

name: Skirt Chasing
effect: If you have a Male character or a Kon in your party, deplete all Females in your opponent's party.

name: Soi Fon - Squad 2 Captain
effect:
Cute, Female, Soldier, Soul Reaper

Deplete: Choose a depleted character in play and discard it. Use while you have only Squad 2 characters in your party.

name: Sosuke - Patient Listener
effect:
Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

(If your guardian is Sosuke Aizen, you may pay Sosuke's energy cost with any 5 energy instead.)

name: Sosuke - Revealed
effect:
Evil, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper

All Good characters in play get -2 to all stats.

name: Sticky Situation
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Your opponent discards 2 cards from his hand or depletes 2 characters in his party.

name: Stop Messing Around!
effect: Your attacking character gets +5 to all stats this battle and does not deal power damage. Play only during battle.

name: Surprise Visitors
effect: When one of your Squad 13 characters enters play this turn, your opponent chooses a character in his party. That character cannot attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Suzumushi Tsuishiki Enmakorogi
effect: (Kaname Tosen) Your opponent reveals the first card he would draw each turn before putting it in his hand. You may have him put that card at the bottom of his deck and draw another card instead.

name: Tessai - Diligent Worker
effect:
Good, Human, Male

When Tessai enters play, search your deck for an item and put it in your hand.

name: The Chase is On
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Name a card type that is in your discard pile. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a card of that type. Put that card in your hand and then put the rest in your discard pile in order.

name: The Perfect Plan
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) If your party has 3 or more Cute characters, your opponent can only attack 1 time this turn.

name: Thumbs Up!
effect: (Remove from game after use) Draw 2 cards. If you play 3 or more cards after Thumbs Up! this Step, renew all your energy at the end of this Step. Play only during your opponent's Main Step. (Limit 2 copies per deck)

name: Timely Retreat
effect: Renew your defending character and remove him from the battle. You take -2 power damage from this attack. Use before winning and losing characters are defined.

name: Toshiro - Keeping the Peace
effect:
Cute, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper
1 Spirit: if your opponent attacked with 2 or more characters in his last turn, Toshiro does not deplete the first time he attacks this turn.

name: Toshiro - Little Shiro (Alternate art)
effect:
Cute, Male, Spirit

When Toshiro enters play choose a Spirit in your party. That Spirit gains "Aggressive" for this turn.

name: Toshiro Hitsugaya
effect:
Guardian's Power: 36

Any character in your party that has attacked 1 or more times this turn gets +1 to all stats during battle. (*) When you attack with a character that has attacked 1 or more times this turn, gain 1 power.

name: Ugaki - Contemplative
effect:
Bount, Evil, Human, Male
When Ugaki enters play, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put any non-character cards into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Unlocked Potential
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Renew a character in your party. That character cannot deal power damage this turn.

name: Ururu - Blaster
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

Ururu gets +1 to all stats while your opponent has one or more Hollows in his party.

name: Ururu - Sparring Partner
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

Deplete, discard Ururu from play: Renew 1 mind, 1 body, and 1 spirit energy. Use only when you play an item while Kisuke is in your party.

name: Uryu - Home Handicrafts Club Member
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy, Student

When Uryu enters play, search your deck for a copy of Sewing Kit and put it in your hand.

name: Uryu - Hospitalized
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy
Quincies in your party renew at the start of your opponent's main step.

name: Uryu - Quincy Again
effect: Discard a Quincy from your hand: You may play an event or item with "quincy" in the title from your hand for no cost. Limit once per turn. * When Uryu enters play, search your deck for one item and one event with "Quincy" in the title and put them in your hand.

name: Uryu - Unleashed
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Quincy, Spirit

When Uryu leaves play, you may search your deck for an item that attaches only to a Quincy and put it in your hand.

name: Yoruichi - Knowledgeable
effect:
Animal, Cute, Spirit

Yoruichi gets -1 INT for each card in your hand.

effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Spirit

If you overlaid Yoruichi, renew 2 body energy.

name: Yoruichi Shihoin
effect:
Guardian's Power: 35

name: Yoshino - Up Close
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Female, Human
Deplete: Discard a character in your opponent's party that has an energy cost less than the number of Souls you have.

name: Yuzu - Karakura Yellow

Cute, Female, Good, Human
